testsuite.name: Scenario: Use an installed version of an installed candidate updates the candidate _HOME variable

testcase.name: And an initialised environment
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an installed version of an installed candidate updates the candidate _HOME variable

testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an installed version of an installed candidate updates the candidate _HOME variable

testcase.name: And the candidate "grails" version "2.1.0" is available for download

testcase.name: And the system is bootstrapped

testcase.name: And the "GRAILS_HOME" variable contains "grails/current"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an installed version of an installed candidate updates the candidate _HOME variable

testcase.name: When I enter "sdk use grails 2.1.0"
testcase.classname: Scenario: Use an installed version of an installed candidate updates the candidate _HOME variable

testcase.name: And I see "Using grails version 2.1.0 in this shell."

testcase.name: Then the "GRAILS_HOME" variable contains "grails/2.1.0"
